thread.title: Ground News - Video game in which terrorists kill Israelis still online despite Hamas attacks
thread.title_full: Ground News - Video game in which terrorists kill Israelis still online despite Hamas attacks

author: The Sun
title: Ground News - Video game in which terrorists kill Israelis still online despite Hamas attacks
text:
Summary by The Sun A VILE video game in which Palestinian militants slaughter Israeli soldiers can still be played online despite the Hamas horror attacks. Scenes include “freedom fighters” using babies as human shields and the Israeli flag being splattered with blood. YoutubeA vile video game in which Palestinian militants slaughter Israeli soldiers can still be played online despite the Hamas horror attacks[/caption] Players of Fursan al-Aqsa: The Knights of the… Share menu More
